name: MGB OIL TEMP
description: MGB oil temperature above limit (greater than 115 °C).

procedure.text: 2. MGB oil temperature — Check on PFD/MFD.

procedure.heading: IF MGB oil temperature within limit:
IF MGB oil temperature above limit or invalid:

procedure.text: 55/55% TQ may be shortly exceeded for the final part of the landing manoeuvre.
